hibernate-mapping.sql-query:
SELECT EOFW.ORG_ID ORG_ID, EOFW.EOFW_ID FEE_ID, EOFW.EOFW_RP_FLAG_CODE RP_FLAG_CODE, EOFW.EOFW_RP_FLAG_NAME RP_FLAG_NAME, EOFW.EOFW_PARTY_CODE PARTY_CODE, EOFW.EOFW_PARTY_NAME PARTY_NAME,
EOFW.EOFW_FEE_CODE FEE_CODE, EOFW.EOFW_FEE_NAME FEE_NAME,
EOFW.EOFW_FEE_TYPE_CODE FEE_TYPE_CODE, EOFW.EOFW_FEE_TYPE_NAME FEE_TYPE_NAME,
EOFW.EOFW_CURRENCY CURRENCY, EOFW.EOFW_PRE_AMOUNT PRE_AMOUNT, EOFW.EOFW_FEE_WAY FEE_WAY,
EOFW.EOFW_UNIT_PRICE UNIT_PRICE, EOFW.EOFW_RP_AMOUNT RP_AMOUNT,
EOFW.EOFW_QUANTITY QUANTITY,
EOFW.EOFW_ORDER_NO SYS_WICHWORK_ORDER_NO, EOFW.EOFW_WORK_ORDER_NO ORDER_NO, EOFW.CREATOR CREATOR, EOFW.CREATE_TIME CREATE_TIME, EOFW.MODIFIER MODIFIER, EOFW.MODIFY_TIME MODIFY_TIME, EOFW.REC_VER REC_VER, EOFW.REC_STATUS REC_STATUS, EOFW.PM_CODE PM_CODE, EOFW.EOFW_EORE_CODE EORE_CODE, EOFW.EOFW_EORE_NAME EORE_NAME, EOFW.EOFW_SOURCE_CODE SOURCE_CODE, EOFW.EOFW_SOURCE_NAME SOURCE_NAME, EOFW.EOFW_FEE_SUBMIT_STATUS_CODE SUBMIT_STATUS_CODE, EOFW.EOFW_FEE_SUBMIT_STATUS_NAME SUBMIT_STATUS_NAME, EOFW.EOFW_FEE_COMFIRM_STATUS_CODE COMFIRM_STATUS_CODE, EOFW.EOFW_FEE_COMFIRM_STATUS_NAME COMFIRM_STATUS_NAME, EOFW.EOFW_PAYMENT_TYPE_CODE PAYMENT_TYPE_CODE, EOFW.EOFW_PAYMENT_TYPE_NAME PAYMENT_TYPE_NAME, EOFW.EOFW_IS_CASH IS_CASH, EOFW.EOFW_PARTY_TYPE_CODE PARTY_TYPE_CODE, EOFW.EOFW_PARTY_TYPE_NAME PARTY_TYPE_NAME, EOFW.EOFW_RATE RATE, EOFW.EOFW_TOTAL_AMOUNT TOTAL_AMOUNT, EOFW.EOFW_IS_HAVE_BILL IS_HAVE_BILL, EOFW.EOFW_BILL_AMOUNT BILL_AMOUNT, EOFW.EOFW_ROUND_TYPE_CODE ROUND_TYPE_CODE, EOFW.EOFW_ROUND_TYPE_NAME ROUND_TYPE_NAME, EOFW.EOFW_BILL_NO BILL_NO, EOFW.EOFW_REMARK REMARK, EOFW.EOFW_IS_HAVE_CHARGEOFF IS_HAVE_CHARGEOFF, EOFW.EOFW_CHARGEOFF_AMOUNT CHARGEOFF_AMOUNT, EOFW.EOFW_IS_RECONCILIATION IS_RECONCILIATION, EOFW.EOFW_RECONCILIATION_DATE RECONCILIATION_DATE, EOFW.EOFW_INVOICE_DATE INVOICE_DATE, EOFW.EOFW_CHARGEOFF_DATE CHARGEOFF_DATE
FROM EO_FEE_MANAGEMENT_WORK EOFW WHERE 1=1 << AND EOFW.ORG_ID=:orgId>> << AND EOFW.EOFW_WORK_ORDER_NO LIKE :orderNo>>
